00078 TAnalyzerKit::TAnalyzerKit()
00079 {
00080 
00081         SO_KIT_CONSTRUCTOR(TAnalyzerKit);
00082         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( previousSplit, (0,0,0) );
00083         SO_NODE_ADD_FIELD( previousElemSize, (0) );
00084         
00085 
00086         //SO_KIT_CHANGE_ENTRY_TYPE(shape, TShape, TCube);

00088         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_ENTRY(result, TAnalyzerResult, FALSE, this, "", TRUE);
00089         SO_KIT_ADD_CATALOG_LIST_ENTRY(levelList, SoGroup, FALSE, this, "" , TAnalyzerLevel, TRUE);
00090         SO_KIT_ADD_LIST_ITEM_TYPE(levelList, TAnalyzerLevel);
00091 
00092

00094

00100         //material1->transparency.setValue(0.70);

00105         TShapeKit * theShapeKit = new TShapeKit;

00186 SoNodeKitListPart * TAnalyzerKit::GetLevelList()
00187 {
00188         return static_cast<SoNodeKitListPart*> (getPart("levelList", true));

00190 
00191 TSeparatorKit * TAnalyzerKit::GetResultsList()
00192 {
00193         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( getPart( "childList", true ) );
00194         if (coinPartList->getNumChildren()>1)
00195                 return static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( coinPartList->getChild(1) );
00196         else
00197                 return NULL;
00198 }
00199 
00200 std::string to_string( const int & Value )
00201 {
00202     // utiliser un flux de sortie pour créer la chaîne
00203     std::ostringstream oss;
00204     // écrire la valeur dans le flux
00205     oss << Value;
00206     // renvoyer une string
00207     return oss.str();
00208 }

00210 void TAnalyzerKit::RemoveResult(SceneModel * pModel)
00211 {
00212         TSeparatorKit * analyzerResultList = GetResultsList();
00213         if (analyzerResultList)
00214         {
00215                 SoNodeKitListPart*analyzerResultListChilds = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( analyzerResultList->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00216                 //unsigned int nbSplit = xSplit*ySplit*zSplit;
00217                 if ( analyzerResultListChilds )
00218                 {
00219                         while (analyzerResultListChilds->getNumChildren()>0)
00220                         {
00221                                         pModel->RemoveCoinNode( 0, *analyzerResultList );
00222                         }
00223                                 previousSplit.setValue(0,0,0);
00224                                 previousElemSize.setValue(0);
00225 
00226                 }
00227         }
00228 }
00229 
00230 void TAnalyzerKit::PrepareCompute(SceneModel * pModel)
00231 {
00232 
00233     TAnalyzerParameter * analyzerParameter;
00234     TAnalyzerResult * analyzerResult;
00235     TShape* tshape;
00236     TMaterial * material ;
00237 
00238 
00239         analyzerResult = static_cast<TAnalyzerResult*> (getPart("result", false));
00240 
00241         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( getPart( "childList", true ) );
00242         TShapeKit * mainShapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( coinPartList->getChild(0) );
00243         material = static_cast< TMaterial* >(mainShapeKit->getPart("material", false) );
00244         tshape = static_cast< TShape* >( mainShapeKit->getPart("shape", false) );
00245 
00246         analyzerResult->numRayIntersected=0;
00247         analyzerParameter = static_cast<TAnalyzerParameter*> (getPart("parameter", false));
00248         analyzerParameter->setParent(this);
00249 
00250         short xSplit,ySplit,zSplit;
00251         analyzerParameter->split.getValue().getValue(xSplit,ySplit,zSplit);
00252         if (xSplit<1) xSplit=1;
00253         if (ySplit<1) ySplit=1;
00254         if (zSplit<1) zSplit=1;
00255         analyzerParameter->split.setValue(xSplit,ySplit,zSplit);
00256         TSeparatorKit * analyzerResultList = GetResultsList();
00257         if (analyzerResultList)
00258         {
00259                 SoNodeKitListPart*analyzerResultListChilds = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( analyzerResultList->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00260 
00261                 if ((analyzerParameter->split.getValue()!=previousSplit.getValue())
00262                         ||(analyzerParameter->elemSize.getValue()!=previousElemSize.getValue()))
00263                 {
00264                         //unsigned int nbSplit = xSplit*ySplit*zSplit;
00265                         if ( analyzerResultListChilds )
00266                         {
00267                                 RemoveResult(pModel);
00268 
00269                                 BBox box = tshape->GetBBox();
00270                                 double incX = (box.pMax.x-box.pMin.x)/(2.0*double(xSplit));
00271                                 double incY = (box.pMax.y-box.pMin.y)/(2.0*double(ySplit));
00272                                 double incZ = (box.pMax.z-box.pMin.z)/(2.0*double(zSplit));
00273 
00274                                 for( int indexX = 0; indexX < xSplit; indexX++ )
00275                                 {
00276                                         for( int indexY = 0; indexY < ySplit; indexY++ )
00277                                         {
00278                                                 for( int indexZ = 0; indexZ < zSplit; indexZ++ )
00279                                                 {
00280                                                         TAnalyzerResultKit * tanalyzerResultKit = new TAnalyzerResultKit;
00281 
00282                                                         TDefaultMaterial * material2 = new TDefaultMaterial;
00283                                                         material2->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00284                                                         material2->transparency.setValue(0.70f);
00285                                                         tanalyzerResultKit->setPart( "material", material2 );
00286 
00287                                                         TShape * tshape2 = static_cast< TShape* >( tshape->copy( false ) );
00288                                                         tanalyzerResultKit->setPart( "shape", tshape2 );
00289 
00290                                                         SoTransform* subTransform = new SoTransform;
00291                                                         subTransform->translation.setValue( box.pMin.x + (1.0+2.0*indexX)*incX,
00292                                                                         box.pMin.y + (1.0+2.0*indexY)*incY, box.pMin.z + (1.0+2.0*indexZ)*incZ );
00293                                                         subTransform->scaleFactor.setValue( 1.0/double(xSplit)*0.95, 1.0/double(ySplit)*.95, 1.0/double(zSplit)*0.95 );
00294 
00295                                                         tanalyzerResultKit->setPart( "transform" , subTransform );
00296                                                         tanalyzerResultKit->setName(  ("x:" + to_string(indexX)+" - y:"+to_string(indexY)+" - z:"+to_string(indexZ)).c_str() );
00297 
00298                                                         pModel->InsertCoinNode(*tanalyzerResultKit, *analyzerResultList );
00299                                                 }
00300                                         }
00301                                 }
00302 
00303         /*                      while (analyzerResultListChilds->getNumChildren()>0)
00304                                 {
00305                                                 pModel->RemoveCoinNode( 0, *analyzerResultList );
00306                                 }*/
00307                         }
00308                         previousSplit.setValue(xSplit,ySplit,zSplit);
00309                         previousElemSize=analyzerParameter->elemSize.getValue();
00310                 }
00311         }
00312 }
00313 
00314 void TAnalyzerKit::FinalizeCompute(double /*raydensity*/, Transform * /*m_transformWTO*/)
00315 {
00316         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( getPart( "childList", true ) );
00317         TShapeKit * mainShapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( coinPartList->getChild(0) );
00318         SoDrawStyle * drawStyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00319         drawStyle->style = SoDrawStyle::INVISIBLE;
00320         mainShapeKit->setPart("drawStyle",drawStyle);
00321 
00322         SoPickStyle * pickStyle = new SoPickStyle;
00323         pickStyle->style = SoPickStyle::UNPICKABLE;
00324         mainShapeKit->setPart("pickStyle",pickStyle);
00325 }
00326 
00327 void TAnalyzerKit::UpdateSize(SceneModel * pModel)
00328 {
00329         TAnalyzerParameter * analyzerParameter = static_cast<TAnalyzerParameter*> (getPart("parameter", false));
00330         if (analyzerParameter &&((analyzerParameter->split.getValue()!=previousSplit.getValue())
00331         ||(analyzerParameter->elemSize.getValue()!=previousElemSize.getValue())))
00332         {
00333                 TShape* tshape;
00334                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( getPart( "childList", true ) );
00335                 TShapeKit * mainShapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( coinPartList->getChild(0) );
00336                 tshape = static_cast< TShape* >( mainShapeKit->getPart("shape", false) );
00337                 if (tshape->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TCube::getClassTypeId()))
00338                 {
00339                         short xSplit,ySplit,zSplit;
00340                         analyzerParameter->split.getValue().getValue(xSplit,ySplit,zSplit);
00341 
00342                         TCube * tcube = static_cast< TCube* >( tshape );
00343 
00344                         tcube->m_width.setValue(analyzerParameter->elemSize.getValue()*xSplit);
00345                         tcube->m_height.setValue(analyzerParameter->elemSize.getValue()*ySplit);
00346                         tcube->m_depth.setValue(analyzerParameter->elemSize.getValue()*zSplit);
00347                         RemoveResult(pModel);
00348                 }
00349         }
00350 }
00351 
00352 void TAnalyzerKit::DisplayResults()
00353 {
00354         TSeparatorKit * analyzerResultList = GetResultsList();
00355         if (analyzerResultList)
00356         {
00357                 SoNodeKitListPart*analyzerResultListChilds = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( analyzerResultList->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00358                 TAnalyzerParameter * analyzerParameter = static_cast<TAnalyzerParameter*> (getPart("parameter", false));
00359                 analyzerParameter->setParent(this);
00360                 for( int i=0; i<analyzerResultListChilds->getNumChildren();i++)
00361                 {
00362                         TAnalyzerResultKit* resultChild = static_cast< TAnalyzerResultKit* >(analyzerResultListChilds->getChild(i) );
00363                         resultChild->DisplayResult(analyzerParameter->infoDisplayed.getValue(),GetLevelList());
00364                 }
00365         }
00366 }
00367 
00368 void TAnalyzerKit::ResetValues()
00369 {
00370         TSeparatorKit * analyzerResultList = GetResultsList();
00371         if (analyzerResultList)
00372         {
00373                 SoNodeKitListPart*analyzerResultListChilds = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( analyzerResultList->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00374                 for( int i=0; i<analyzerResultListChilds->getNumChildren();i++)
00375                 {
00376                         TAnalyzerResultKit* resultChild = static_cast< TAnalyzerResultKit* >(analyzerResultListChilds->getChild(i) );
00377                         resultChild->ResetValues();
00378                 }
00379                 DisplayResults();
00380         }
00381 }
